info.title: MLB Bat Tracking Leaderboard 2024-2025
info.subtitle: New Statcast metrics: bat speed, swing length, squared-up%, and more
info.description:
## Overview

This dataset contains MLB Bat Tracking leaderboard data for the 2024 and 2025 seasons. Bat Tracking is a new Statcast feature introduced in 2024 that measures batter swing characteristics using high-speed cameras.

## Dataset Contents

- **452 batters** (226 per season)
- **19 columns** including:
  - `avg_bat_speed`: Average bat speed at impact (mph)
  - `swing_length`: Distance the bat head travels during the swing (feet)
  - `squared_up_per_bat_contact`: Percentage of well-struck balls
  - `hard_swing_rate`: Percentage of swings with high bat speed
  - `blast_per_bat_contact`: Percentage of balls hit with ideal launch conditions
  - `swords`: Swings and misses on pitches outside the zone
  - `batter_run_value`: Runs created above/below average

## Data Source

Data is sourced from [Baseball Savant](https://baseballsavant.mlb.com/leaderboard/bat-tracking), MLB's official Statcast data platform.

## Usage Ideas

- Compare swing mechanics across different player types
- Analyze correlation between bat speed and power metrics
- Identify swing efficiency patterns (swing length vs contact rate)
- Build predictive models for batting performance
- Year-over-year player development analysis (2024 vs 2025)

## Column Descriptions

| Column | Description |
|--------|-------------|
| `id` | Baseball Savant player ID |
| `name` | Player name |
| `swings_competitive` | Number of competitive swings |
| `percent_swings_competitive` | Percentage of swings that are competitive |
| `contact` | Number of times contact was made |
| `avg_bat_speed` | Average bat speed (mph) |
| `hard_swing_rate` | Rate of swings with high bat speed |
| `squared_up_per_bat_contact` | Rate of squared-up balls per contact |
| `squared_up_per_swing` | Rate of squared-up balls per swing |
| `blast_per_bat_contact` | Rate of ideal launch per contact |
| `blast_per_swing` | Rate of ideal launch per swing |
| `swing_length` | Average swing length (feet) |
| `swords` | Swings and misses outside the zone |
| `batter_run_value` | Runs created above/below average |
| `whiffs` | Total swings and misses |
| `whiff_per_swing` | Rate of swings and misses |
| `batted_ball_events` | Number of batted ball events |
| `batted_ball_event_per_swing` | Rate of batted balls per swing |
| `season` | Season year (2024 or 2025) |

## License

CC0: Public Domain. Data is publicly available from Baseball Savant.
